item.title: SPARK, a meme coin, saw its market cap briefly surpass $20 million, with a 24-hour price increase of over 48.56%.
item.description: On August 31st, based on GMGN data, the on-chain AI virtual creature concept Meme token SPARK's market capitalization briefly exceeded $20 million. Currently, it is at $18.6 million. It has a 24-hour price increase of 48.56% and a 24-hour trading volume of $4.1 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience high price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: EigenCloud has announced the latest developments in the project and plans to expand its applications in multiple areas.
item.description: On August 31st, EigenCloud declared its most recent project plan. This plan will be employed to provide support for applications in various fields such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), A2A, DeFi, zkTLS, Real World Assets (RWAs), DeFAI, DePIN, Intelligent Agents, Rollups, and Oracles.On June 17th, Eigen Labs announced the commencement of the Ethereum Re-Staking Protocol EigenCloud. a16z crypto is set to invest $70 million by directly purchasing EIGEN tokens. This follows a16z's additional investment of $100 million in EigenLayer in February 2024. EigenCloud is constructed on top of the EigenLayer Re-Staking Protocol and integrates functions like Data Availability (EigenDA), Generalized Computation (EigenCompute), and Dispute Resolution (EigenVerify). The platform enables developers to cryptographically verify off-chain activities, offering the same level of trust guarantees as on-chain activities. Currently, more than $12 billion in re-staked assets safeguard over 200 decentralized se

item.title: Renowned trader TechnoRevenant holds approximately a $28.9 million long position in XPL, representing 13.4% of the total network holdings.
item.description: On August 31, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, the renowned trader TechnoRevenant holds a substantial long position with low leverage in XPL on Hyperliquid. There are 13 different addresses involved, and the total value of the long position is approximately $28.9 million, accounting for 38% of the total open interest ($76.15 million) on Hyperliquid. All of these positions have a leverage of less than 1x.According to Coinglass data, the current global open interest in XPL futures is reported to be $216 million, with a 24-hour increase of 3.99%.

item.title: APE Token to Expand to the Solana Blockchain and Undergo DeFi Integration
item.description: On August 31st, the ApeCoin team officially declared the commencement of the R.A.I.D (Rapid ApeCoin Integration Deployment) strategy. The intention is to transform ApeCoin from a governance token into a "cultural token" and stimulate the growth of its ecosystem. The APE project initially intends to expand to the Solana blockchain and undergo DeFi integration.

item.title: James Wynn's previously shilled meme coin GOAT has surged over 67.4% in the past 24 hours, with a current market cap of $12.5 million.
item.description: On August 31st, based on GMGN data, James Wynn's previously promoted meme coin Goatcoin (GOAT) witnessed a surge of over 67.4% in the past 24 hours. It currently has a market capitalization of $12.5 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $7.2 million.On August 27th, James Wynn made a post on Platform X promoting the meme coin Goatcoin (GOAT) and stating that "its market capitalization is expected to reach several billion dollars." On that day, GOAT responded with a surge of over 200%, pushing its market capitalization beyond $10 million.BlockBeats reminds users that meme coins usually lack practical use cases and experience significant price fluctuations. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin and Gold Under Pressure Simultaneously as Market Enters Risk-Off Mode
item.description: August 31st. During this month, the data of Bitcoin and Gold ETF shows that the recent fund flows have deviated from historical trends. Usually, the flows of funds in both assets are opposite, but this time both experienced outflows simultaneously. This rare phenomenon reflects the current macroeconomic environment and investor sentiment. The outflows of Bitcoin have not had an impact on Gold. And until the policy path of the Fed becomes clear, both will continue to face pressure.Bitcoin ETF witnessed outflows for six consecutive days and lost nearly $2 billion alone in August. At the same time, major Gold ETFs such as GLDM also experienced outflows of $449 million in a week. Bitcoin ETF finally rebounded at the end of August, with four consecutive days of inflows. Gold ETF also showed net inflows in the last few days of August 2025, similar to the rebound trend of Bitcoin ETF.The uncertainties of the Fed's monetary policy, persistent inflationary pressures, and signs of a weak lab

item.title: About 16.27 billion WLFI tokens have been transferred to the Lockbox contract, estimated to be worth 4.83 billion US dollars.
item.description: On August 31st, according to on-chain data, around 16.27 billion WLFI tokens have been transferred to the Lockbox contract, which makes up 16.27% of the total token supply. Given the current contract price of $0.297, the value is approximately $4.83 billion.BlockBeats reported previously that the WLFI token will officially start unlocking at 8:00 AM EST on September 1st, and the relevant functionality page (Lockbox) has been launched. Users needed to activate between August 25th and August 31st in order to be able to claim 20% of the unlocked tokens starting from September 1st.

item.title: The Ethereum Community Fund has announced the tokenization of already burned ETH into BETH to provide a new proof of burn.
item.description: On August 31st, the Ethereum Community Foundation announced the tokenization of the burned ETH into BETH, presenting a new Ethereum Burn Proof Token. Each BETH token symbolizes ETH that has been verified to have been removed from circulation, thereby establishing a transparent and auditable burn record.Ethereum co-founder and Consensys CEO Joseph Lubin retweeted, expressing his great appreciation for the team's efforts.

item.title: Pudgy Penguins' game Pudgy Party is now available on the Apple and Google stores
item.description: August 31st. As per an official announcement by Pudgy Penguins, their Web 3 mobile game, Pudgy Party, has been launched on both the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store.BlockBeats had previously reported that on August 29th, the well-known NFT brand Pudgy Penguins announced the global launch of the Web3 mobile game Pudgy Party in collaboration with the developer of FIFA Rivals, Mythical Games. Pudgy Party is a casual and fun party battle royale game set in a fast-paced mini-game environment. The game features characters that are entirely based on the iconic Pudgy Penguins imagery, each with its own unique traits, abilities, and personalities. Each match is designed to be fresh and unpredictable, with constantly rotating challenge content and unexpected changes to ensure that no two parties are the same. Players can customize their penguin characters through clothing, emotes, and collectibles - some of which are non-fungible, while others are limited edition and tradable on Mythi
